document.full_text: andy roddick beat james blake, 6-3, 7-5, in the second round of the bnp paribas open at the indian wells tennis garden in indian wells, calif.
document.title: sports briefing | tennis: roddick tops blake at indian wells
lines_and_colors: andy roddick beat james blake, 6-3, 7-5, in the second round of the bnp paribas open at the indian wells tennis garden in indian wells, calif.
